description:
Update:
  1. Able to generate for multi XML files and Excel format unlimited.
  2. Update 'Analyze Report (*trf)' with DCOM and MonAlg.
  3. Able to write for signals from Model_Access by set the last element is 'Write'. Ex: [3] [signal BrkVehCfg = 3] [3] [BrkVehCfg] [Write]
  4. Able to maximize tool's window.
